nodes.bodyText:
Can you remove the trailing */?
Otherwise, all else looks great.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,2 +1,3 @@
 AWS Greengrass V2
-Copyright 2019 Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. All Rights Reserved. 
+Copyright Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. All Rights Reserved.
+SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 */

nodes.bodyText: Just literally removing the */ would break everything.  Did you mean putting it on a line by itself?  Or switching from /*...*/ to // ?   What's wrong with the syntax as it is?  I could expand it from two lines to three or four, but how does that help?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,2 +1,3 @@
 AWS Greengrass V2
-Copyright 2019 Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. All Rights Reserved. 
+Copyright Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. All Rights Reserved.
+SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 */

nodes.bodyText: I mean that this is the NOTICE file, which is not code, so it shouldn't have that style of "comment" there.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,2 +1,3 @@
 AWS Greengrass V2
-Copyright 2019 Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. All Rights Reserved. 
+Copyright Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. All Rights Reserved.
+SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 */
